title: A Three Eyed MONSTER!  Testing The Galaxy S10 Cameras
description: The Samsung Galaxy S10 camera is supposedly one of the best around, even with the Huawei P30 pro now being introduced.  In this video, we put the S10's standard, wide angle and telephoto cameras to the test and compare it to the Pixel 3.  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Razer Blade 15 RTX 2060:     Razer Blade 15 RTX 2070:   Razer Blade 15 RTX 2080:    Check Out the Massdrop HE4XX:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Samsung Canada. This video is sponsored by Razer and Massdrop. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #galaxyS10 #galaxys10camera #hardwarecanucks
